Value:

temp = saturated_mul16(A, *LAR);                        \
        temp = saturated_add16(temp, B);                        \
        temp = saturated_add16(temp, 256);                      \
        temp >>= 9;                                             \
        *LAR  = (int16_t) ((temp > MAC)                         \
                         ?                                      \
                         MAC - MIC                              \
                         :                                      \
                         ((temp < MIC)  ?  0  :  temp - MIC));  \
        LAR++;
